Temperature of the Omicron RTD stage temp. omicron SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 385 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time desc Temperature / K 1
SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 389 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time desc Temperature / C Temperature in the Omicron Nanobeam agg. chamber Temperature aggregation zone 2
SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 386 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time desc Pressure / mbar Pressure in the Omicron Analytical chamber pressure omicron ANA 3
SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 388 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time desc Pressure / mbar Pressure in the Omicron Nanobeam chamber pressure nanobeam 2011 5
SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 387 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" and value > 1e-13 order by time desc Pressure / mbar Pressure in the Omicron Prep chamber pressure omicron PREP 7
SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 460 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time desc Pressure / mbar Rouging pump pressure, analysis chamber turbo Rough ana 2
SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 461 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time desc Pressure / mbar Rouging pump pressure, preparation chamber turbo Rough prep 4
SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_omicron where type = 462 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time desc Pressure / mbar Rouhing pump pressure, ion gun diff turbo Rough diff 6

rasppi98:omicron_ana_pressure Analysis chamber pressure [mbar] #0000FF select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_omicron where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="omicron_ana_pressure") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}
